entity_name: Law Office of Angelo J. Reyes, APC
short_description: CA-based boutique law firm specializing in criminal defense and personal injury representation.
long_description: The Law Office of Angelo J. Reyes, APC, based in Carlsbad, CA, provides high-quality legal services in personal injury and criminal defense matters statewide. Founded by trial attorney Angelo J. Reyes, the firm stands out for courtroom experience, client-focused care, and advanced technology, securing results for clients with compassion and precision.
